SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Letter
Represents a single letter character.
Main
The main entry point for the text processing application.
Punctuation
Represents a punctuation mark or a delimiter (like a space) within a sentence.
Sentence
Represents a sentence, which is composed of a sequence of SentenceElement objects.
SentenceElement
A marker interface for components that can be part of a sentence.
Text
Represents a full text, which is composed of a sequence of Sentence objects.
TextParser
A parser that converts a raw string into a structured Text object.
TextProcessor
A class containing methods to process a structured Text object.
Word
Represents a word, which is composed of a sequence of Letter objects.
